content: As of the end of this week, I will no-longer be an employee of GE Healthcare. I have been affected by a broad Reduction-In-Force. I will continue HL7 engagement as an independent, until I end up somewhere (Thanks to HL7 for having this mechanism). Any advice or pointers anyone can offer are greatly appreciated. Please contact me at my gmail address from now on - JohnMoehrke@med.ge.com
Sorry to hear that John! BTW I think you put the wrong e-mail address in your note.
oh, duh. Old habits die hard... JohnMoehrke@gmail.com
